resources.string: Paper and cardboard packaging, waste paper, leaflets, cardboard boxes, notebooks, office paper, newspapers.
Empty food and beverage bottles and jars, without tops and lids and carrier bags, empty glass cosmetics bottles.
Plastic bags, milk and beverage cartons, bottle tops and lids, yogurt containers, plastic beverage bottles, cleaning products, cosmetics packaging, metal packaging, beverage cans.
Kitchen vegetable waste: peels from vegetables and fruits, remains of plant products (e.g. coffee and tea grounds), grass, leaves, small branches.
Animal bones and excrements: meat, bones, skins leftovers, egg shells, disposable diapers, contaminated paper, ceramics and textiles, animal excrements, ash (cold), regular filament bulbs.
